lexUnit.name: button.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a small disc or knob sewn on to a garment, either to fasten it by being pushed through a buttonhole or for decoration.

sentence.text: She lay quiescent and felt his strong fingers , quicker now , move to unfasten the buttons of her shift one by one .
The decorations shone on the walls and I loosened the buttons of my tunic and slipped my tie down a few inches .
Swiftly , she unfastened the small pearl buttons of her bodice , and pulled the dress over her head .
His fingers flipped open the buttons of his waistcoat .
Then his fingers fumbled to unfasten the small buttons of her suit jacket .
She took care of that by moving the buttons on her skirts , then buying a larger size .
He was removing his thick leather belt with one hand and struggling with one of her buttons .
I point to her buttons , she closes them with shaking hands .
Bernice 's fingers worked on her coat button .
There was a loose thread on one of Carter 's shirt buttons .
But I I need to you see I need some buttons for Beverley and Melanie 's cardigans .
I like overshirts and rib tops with zips and buttons .
Some of them are deliberately military , with wide lapels , brass buttons and deep cuffs .
She wore a naval greatcoat with brass buttons and some sort of goggles on her head .
He thought about it as he did up his buttons and arranged the sheets on his mattress ; he was working out rhymes and rhythms in his head , trying to achieve a witty second line .
` The blouse in pink crepe de chine is fastened by three mother-of-pearl buttons at the neck . "
She rose and picked up her coat and fastened the buttons with a feeling of determination .
` Will you sew on my button ? "
She sewed buttons on to a white shirt she 'd made .
He undid the top buttons of his shirt and pulled the shirt apart .
She started to undo the buttons of his blouse .
` Could n't wait , eh ? " she asked , grinning as she began to undo his shirt buttons .
His hands were to the buttons of her dress .
He opened another button on his shirt , and she could see his thick , matted chest hair .
Two buttons of her blouse had come unfastened .
